#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
   {
   		long long int n;
   		cin>>n;
   		if(n%9==0)
   		{
   		   cout<<"0\n";
		}
		   else
		   {
		   	long long int y=n/9;
		   	long long int a,b;
		   	a=abs(y*9-n);
		   	if(n>=0)
		   	b=abs((y+1)*9-n);
		   	else
		   	b=abs((y-1)*9-n);
		   	if(a<b)
		   	cout<<a<<"\n";
		   	else
		   	cout<<b<<"\n";
		   	
		   }
   }
}
